title: Emek-keziz
html: EMEK-KEZIZ(Eʹmek-keʹziz) [Low Plain of Cutting Off].A Benjamite city. (Jos 18:21) The exact location of Emek-keziz is today unknown. The meaning of its name and its mention along with Jericho, Beth-hoglah, and Beth-arabah in the Jordan Valley may indicate a location in that vicinity.
